txt.en: You have slain many spiders and poisoned many of their egg-sacs, but that will not be enough to defeat the spiders of the Wovenvales.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This quest is intended for a full fellowship.</rgb>
To put an end to the spider-threat, you should defeat the queen of the Trapdoor-brood, which has brought the two broods together

The queen of the Trapdoor brood can be found somewhere deep within the Wovenvales, in the north-west of the North Trollshaws, north of Thoroniel's camp.

To put an end to the spider-threat, you should defeat the queen of the Trapdoor-brood, which has brought the two broods together.

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This quest is intended for a full fellowship.</rgb>

The queen of the Trapdoor brood can be found somewhere deep within the Wovenvales, in the north-west of the North Trollshaws, north of Thoroniel's camp.\n\nTo put an end to the spider-threat, you should defeat the queen of the Trapdoor-brood, which has brought the two broods together.

'You have had better fortune than I, [placeholder], for I was unable to find the queen of the Flesh-gnawer brood. I believe there was a struggle between the two broods -- for what reason I do not know -- and the queen of the Flesh-gnawer spiders was cast out, or perhaps she was the victor, and the Trapdoor queen was left behind to face you in defeat. I do not know. It is a mystery, and one that I cannot resolve to my satisfaction.\n\n'Our task here is half-completed, but we must be satisfied with this small victory for the time being. We have halted the threat, and that must be enough.'
Thoroniel is encamped south of the Wovenvales.\n\nThoroniel will be pleased to hear that you have defeated the Trapdoor queen.

'Gather your allies and journey once more into the Wovenvales in search of the trapdoor-spider queen. I will find the queen of the flesh-gnawer spiders and deal with her accordingly. Meet me back here in victory!'
'Thoroniel was pleased with your efforts in the Wovenvales.'
To put an end to the spider-threat, you should defeat the queen of the Trapdoor-brood, which has brought the two broods together
'The flesh-gnawer queen cannot hide forever. We will find her some day.'
'The flesh-gnawer queen cannot escape my blade forever.'

The queen of the Trapdoor brood can be found somewhere deep within the Wovenvales, in the north-west of the North Trollshaws, north of Thoroniel's camp.\n\nTo put an end to the spider-threat, you should defeat the queen of the Trapdoor-brood, which has brought the two broods together.
